item.title: The Tommy and Hector Podcast with Laurita Blewitt | The Tommy, Hector & Laurita Podcast
item.description: Podcast Description Pure conversation, of the language loving storytelling variety. Unpredictable and funny, carefree and intimate. Join Tommy Tiernan, his school pal Hector O’hEeochagain and Mayo woman Laurita Blewitt as they sit around the table in a shed at the bottom of a garden in the West of Ireland and just chat. You’ll wish you were there to join in…. A brand new weekly podcast. Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/the-tommy-and-hector-podcast-with-laurita-blewitt.
